subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: With two outs in the bottom of the 10th and two strikes on Miguel Cabrera, Buster Posey called for Sergio Romo to throw his best pitch, a slider. But Romo had other thoughts.
snippet: With two outs in the bottom of the 10th and two strikes on Miguel Cabrera, Buster Posey called for Sergio Romo to throw his best pitch, a slider. But Romo had other thoughts.
